name: No Yawa Official Video x Kari Jay

metadata.name: No Yawa Official Video x Kari Jay 1
metadata.description: "Yawa" is a pidgin slang term widely used among  West African youth, meaning problems or obstacles. "No Yawa" of Sacred Vol. 3, the latest body of work by Kari Jay, is a prayer and a manifestation. Shot in Elmina, Ghana on the shores of the Atlantic ocean, this work is an embodiment of Kujichagulia, or collective self-determination. Like the water we have no enemies and no yawa. Featuring the Hard Youth of Cape Coast and Takoradi: Jallel, Jojo, Fontwe, Khali, we dey.

properties.name: No Yawa Official Video x Kari Jay
